column1: I enjoyed watching Ultimate Fighting Championship President Dana White passionately proclaim his support for President @realDonaldTrump this evening.  He spoke about what he witnessed firsthand about President Trump’s hard work and determination in his COVID-19 response. #RNC2020 https://t.co/bDFnoWf14S

Tonight at the #RNC2020 @FLOTUS spoke about the strength determination and resilience of the American people during this time something we have witnessed first-hand among neighbors in our great Mountain State amid COVID-19. #LandOfOpportunity #WVstrong https://t.co/DZtfozzd0k

Registered nurse Amy Ford from Williamson #WV spoke at tonight’s #RNC2020. She is the daughter of a nurse and a coal miner. She traveled to New York for the first time this year to treat COVID-19 patients. She is a true American patriot! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/S30FNK7Y1P

.@realDonaldTrump is committed to hardworking Americans as our economy recovers from the impact of the coronavirus.  ➡️ 2.5 million jobs created  ➡️ Unemployment rate decreased to 13.3%   This rapid record-breaking growth is great news for our country! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/fhmxRrB5Qt
